extendedInfo.description: Chuco Artist Network Mobile Application:Basic Edition- With Ads- Homepage ( Links to Chucoartist.com )- Pictures  - Wall  - Featured Artists  - Chuco Artists  - La Pistolera- Music Player  - Rock  - Alternative  - Chucanismo  - Metal  - Electronica  - Classical- Facebook Connect- Videos- Comic Strips  - Mundy's  - YouGuys- About Us

reviews.title: Great Beta!
reviews.comment: The Chuco Artist Mobile App is due for an official release on April 13, 2012. Any reviews prior to this date should be ignored as we\'ve been running significant tests...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Vane
reviews.comment: Great App. WAY better functionality than other social media sites(facebook-myspace-booooo!)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bchompz
reviews.comment: Great App. Well worth the wait- art gallery filled with work from local artists-vids-comics- and live music streaming - top that facebook-myface-104.3!!! Chuco Artist Network- BEST local/national(dare i say it) App. So far!!! And the best part is - its local!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Why do you need all that control?
reviews.comment: I was excited and downloaded then came update and I noticed all the permissions-even to take pictures with my phone without my intent. Why do you need to know who I call our who calls me? I removed it.
reviews.author: A Google User
